ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary: Raven Hex Return of the Dark Witch Part 1 of 3: Tarot has a date with Jon Webb while her sister Raven Hex rescues Willowry, a young witch, and takes her as an apprentice. Crypt Chick meets Willowry and ask her to cast a resurrection spell on her.
